rules_text:
Vigilance, Deathtouch
At the beginning of combat, any opponent may collect evidence 4. If they do, tap Cornered Mobster and put two +1/+1 counter on its. [i](To collect evidence 4, exile cards with total mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“As you can see, I've got my hands tied at the moment.”[/i]
